name: block3d
description: 一款支持可视化编程的Web3D开发工具

scripts.build-blocks: cd blocks && npm run build && cp -v -r dist/block3d.umd.js ../dist_frontend/js/block3d && cd ..
scripts.build-blocks-obfuscate: cd blocks && npm run build && node tools/buildBlocksObfuscator.js && cd ..
scripts.build-tsdeclare: cd tsdeclare && npm run build && cp -v -r dist/tsdeclare.umd.js ../dist_frontend/js/block3d && cd ..
scripts.pkg: pkg . -C GZip && cp -v -r server/lib server/projects server/templates server/config.json dist
scripts.build-all: npm run build-blocks-obfuscate && npm run build-tsdeclare && npm run pkg

author: 宅家呗
